keyEvents.title: Marineford Headquarters Collapses
keyEvents.description: The main building of Marine Headquarters begins to crumble and collapse after the devastating battle, with Marines fleeing as it falls apart.
keyEvents.significance: Symbolizes the end of an era and the physical destruction of Marine power despite their victory.

keyEvents.title: Blackbeard Threatens to Sink Marineford
keyEvents.description: Blackbeard demonstrates Whitebeard's stolen power by threatening to sink the entire island to its core.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the devastating power now in Blackbeard's hands and the threat to Marineford's existence.

keyEvents.title: Trafalgar Law Arrives at Marineford
keyEvents.description: Law's submarine surfaces at Marineford, and he offers to save Luffy as a doctor.
keyEvents.significance: Law's dramatic entrance at the climax of the war, offering hope for Luffy's survival.

statusHistory.description: Headquarters collapsing after the Summit War
